scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/aem-showcase/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/aem-showcase
  set jcr:title{String} to "AEM Showcase"
end

set properties on /content/dam/aem-showcase/comments/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/aem-showcase
  set jcr:title{String} to "AEM Showcase Comments"
end

create service user aem-showcase-jcr-service-user with forced path system/cq:services/aem-showcase-jcr-service-user
 set principal ACL for aem-showcase-jcr-service-user
 allow jcr:read,rep:write on /content/dam/aem-showcase
end
